metadata.description: Unified data structure for Aarogya Global medical tourism platform

cardiology.name: Cardiology
cardiology.description: Expert heart and cardiovascular care services

overview.description: Cardiology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the heart and cardiovascular system. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best cardiology hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.

orthopaedics.name: Orthopaedics
orthopaedics.description: Specialized care for bones, joints, muscles, and skeletal system

overview.description: Orthopaedics is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of conditions affecting the musculoskeletal system including bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, and tendons. Our medical tourism platform connects patients with the best orthopedic hospitals and doctors worldwide, offering advanced diagnostic tools, cutting-edge treatment options, and cost-effective healthcare solutions.
highlights: Top-rated orthopedic surgeons with international experience

treatments.name: Total Knee Replacement (TKR)
treatments.description: Replace damaged knee joint surfaces with prosthetic components to relieve pain and restore function.
treatments.recovery: Walk day 0–1; hospital stay 1–3 days; return to daily activities ~6 weeks; full recovery up to 12 months.
treatments.hospitalSelectionCriteria: What helps to find the best hospital?
treatments.topDoctors: How to select the best doctor?
treatments.doctorSelectionCriteria: How to select the best doctor?
diagnosticTools: Standing knee X‑rays (AP/lateral), long‑leg alignment views
advantages: long implant life—~82% of TKRs last ≥25 years
high satisfaction when done at high‑volume centers
treatments.costConsiderations: India private hospitals: ~₹2.0–3.5 lakh per knee; bilateral ₹4–7 lakh (excl. travel). Costs vary by city, implant, room, and comorbidities.

treatments.name: Total Hip Replacement (THR)
treatments.description: Replace diseased hip joint surfaces with artificial components to relieve pain and improve function.
treatments.recovery: Hospital 2–4 days; most daily activities in 3–6 weeks; full recovery usually 6–12 months.
treatments.hospitalSelectionCriteria: What helps to find the best hospital?
treatments.topDoctors: How to select the best doctor?
treatments.doctorSelectionCriteria: How to select the best doctor?
advantages: long implant life—~58% last ≥25 yrs in registry data
treatments.costConsiderations: India private hospitals: ~₹1.5–4.0 lakh per hip (varies by implant, room, city). Robotic/minimally‑invasive may cost more.

faq.question: When can I bend/sit cross‑legged?
faq.answer: Depends on approach; follow precautions 6–12 weeks.

treatments.name: ACL/MCL Ligament Reconstruction
treatments.description: Reconstruct torn knee ligaments (commonly ACL) using tendon grafts to restore stability.
treatments.recovery: Crutches 1–2 weeks; jogging ~3 months; return to pivoting sports ~6–9+ months with rehab.
treatments.hospitalSelectionCriteria: What helps to find the best hospital?
treatments.topDoctors: How to select the best doctor?
treatments.doctorSelectionCriteria: How to select the best doctor?
advantages: enables safe RTS when combined with structured rehab and strength benchmarks
treatments.costConsiderations: India private hospitals: ~₹1.1–2.5 lakh depending on graft/implants and city.

faq.question: Why wait 6–9 months to sport?
faq.answer: To allow graft maturation and neuromuscular recovery.

treatments.name: Shoulder Replacement (Anatomic/Reverse)
treatments.description: Replace arthritic or cuff‑deficient shoulder joint with artificial components to reduce pain and improve motion.
treatments.recovery: Sling 2–6 weeks; daily activities 6–12 weeks; functional recovery ~3–6 months; full recovery up to 12 months.
treatments.hospitalSelectionCriteria: What helps to find the best hospital?
treatments.topDoctors: How to select the best doctor?
treatments.doctorSelectionCriteria: How to select the best doctor?
advantages: Strong pain relief and function gains for arthritis and cuff‑tear arthropathy
durable implants with good mid‑ to long‑term outcomes
treatments.costConsiderations: India private hospitals: ~₹2.5–4.5 lakh depending on implant and city.

faq.question: When can I lift weights?
faq.answer: Progressive strengthening after 8–12 weeks; heavy lifting only after surgeon clearance.

globalHospitals.name: Fortis Memorial Research Institute
globalHospitals.address: Sector 44, Opposite HUDA City Centre, Gurugram, Haryana 122003
facilities: Gamma Knife – Gold Standard for Brain Tumour Surgery
MR LINAC for Effective Cancer Treatment
globalHospitals.about:
Fortis Memorial Research Institute (FMRI) is a premier quaternary care hospital located in Gurugram, Delhi NCR. Established in 2013, FMRI is part of the Fortis Healthcare network and is recognized as one of India's most advanced healthcare facilities.

As a quaternary care hospital, FMRI specializes in complex medical procedures and treatments that are not available at most other hospitals. The institute is equipped with cutting-edge medical technology including Gamma Knife for brain tumor surgery, Da Vinci Xi robotic surgery system, and MR LINAC for advanced cancer treatment.

FMRI operates with 330+ patient beds, 15 operating theaters, and 105 ICU beds, making it one of the largest healthcare facilities in the region. The hospital serves over 2 million patients annually and has a team of 200+ specialist doctors.

Key Highlights:
• First hospital in India to offer CAR T-Cell Therapy
• Advanced robotic surgery capabilities
• State-of-the-art cardiac care and transplant programs
• Comprehensive cancer treatment center
• 24/7 emergency services with specialized trauma care

FMRI is accredited by JCI, NABH, and NABL, ensuring the highest standards of patient care and safety. The hospital is strategically located 25 minutes from Indira Gandhi International Airport and is easily accessible via the HUDA City Center Metro Station.

reviews.comment: Based on 10,436 patient reviews on Google

globalHospitals.opdHours: OPD Hours 9 am to 8 pm (Monday - Saturday)
globalHospitals.accessibility: 25 mins from IG International Airport, Opposite HUDA City Center Metro Station (Walking Distance)

globalHospitals.name: Medanta The Medicity
facilities: Blood & Bone Marrow Stem cell Collection
globalHospitals.about:
Medanta Gurugram is founded by Dr. Naresh Trehan, a world-renowned cardiovascular and cardiothoracic surgeon. It was conceived with the mission to deliver advanced yet affordable medical services.

For Six years in a row, Medanta Gurugram has ranked as the Best Private Hospital in India (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024 and 2025). It also featured in the list of top 250 World's Best Hospitals Survey 2024 by Newsweek.

The hospital is equipped to make quality healthcare a reality for countless patients with an infrastructure built according to the guidelines for healthcare facilities by the American Institute of Architects.

reviews.comment: Based on 7,879 patient reviews on Google

globalHospitals.opdHours: OPD Hours 9 am to 8 pm (Monday - Saturday)
globalHospitals.accessibility: 20 mins from IG International Airport (17 km), Near National Highway 48

globalHospitals.name: Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket
globalHospitals.address: 1-2, Press Enclave Road, Saket, New Delhi
facilities: Bone Age estimation with Bone Xpert Software
Shock Wave Therapy for Erectile Dysfunction
treatments: Robotic Surgery with Versius & Da Vinci
MRI Scanner – 3 Tesla MRI for detailed imaging
Cardiac Cath Lab – State-of-the-art cardiac catheterization laboratory
globalHospitals.about:
Located in the heart of south Delhi, the 539+ bed Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, is widely considered as one of the best hospitals in the country. Split into two blocks - East Block (a unit of Devki Devi Foundation) and West Block ( a unit of MHIL - Max Healthcare Institute Limited), it has a complete spectrum of diagnostic and therapeutic technologies, including several which are a First in India and Asia.


Experts at Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, have treated more than 34 lakh patients across 32 specialities combined in the East and West wings. The East wing specializes in treating patients for Cardiac, Oncology (Medical, Surgical, and Radiotherapy), Transplant services (Heart, Lung, Bone Marrow), and General Surgery including Minimal Access and Bariatric Surgery, while the West wing focuses on Nephrology, Neurology, Neurosurgery, Rheumatology, Urology, Transplant Services (Liver & Renal), Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery, and other ancillary services. Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, offers a complete spectrum of diagnostic and therapeutic technologies, including several state-of-the-art technologies that are the first in Asia and India. The hospital has received NABH and JCI accreditation for providing the highest quality of patient safety and care.


Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, offers the advantage of integrated medical care in a multidisciplinary setting provided by a faculty of highly qualified doctors, nurses, & healthcare professionals. Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, is a regional hub for complex procedures such as neurovascular intervention, targeted cancer treatments, heart surgeries, orthopaedic surgeries, liver & kidney transplant, and fertility treatments.

reviews.comment: Based on 8,618 patient reviews on Google

globalHospitals.opdHours: OPD Hours 9 am to 8 pm (Monday - Saturday)
globalHospitals.accessibility: 20 mins from IG International Airport (13 km), Near Malviya Nagar Metro station

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Suresh Reddy
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Suresh Reddy is a highly experienced interventional cardiologist with over 20 years of expertise in treating complex cardiac conditions. He has performed more than 5000 successful angioplasty procedures and is known for his precision and patient care.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Meera Joshi
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Meera Joshi is a renowned cardiac surgeon specializing in complex heart surgeries. With over 16 years of experience, she has successfully performed more than 2000 cardiac surgeries and is known for her innovative surgical techniques.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Vikram Singh
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Vikram Singh is a dedicated pediatric cardiologist with expertise in treating congenital heart diseases in children. He has helped thousands of children with heart conditions and is known for his gentle approach with young patients.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Priya Sharma
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Priya Sharma is a leading neurologist with extensive experience in treating complex neurological disorders. She specializes in stroke treatment and has been instrumental in establishing stroke units across multiple hospitals.

globalDoctors.name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
globalDoctors.about: Dr. Rajesh Kumar is a highly skilled orthopedic surgeon with expertise in joint replacement and arthroscopic surgeries. He has performed over 3000 successful joint replacement surgeries and is known for his precision and patient outcomes.
